chos dbang rin po che'i gter byon padma mthong grol gu ru lha khang gi nang rten mon mkhar steng gi pha bong g.yu sgra can gyi 'og nas gu ru'i sku zhabs rjes mthong bas ngan song khegs pa 'di gdan drangs shing sku'i 'bag 'di gnyis 'khor bcas dang mthun pa'i bla sgrub tshe sgrub kyang so sor yod pa /

bla ma rdo rje 'chang gsung sprul gyi nang rten 'chims phur slob dpon bzhugs dus 'tsho rgyal la sku'i bkod pa bco brgyad bstan skabs ljags chab la rta mdzad jo mo'i phyag bzo ma rab gnas slob dpon nyid kyis mdzad pa'i bkra shis 'od 'bar byang pa'i nang rten pho brang 'dir phebs pa /

skabs 'dir sgrub sde brgyad dang mthun pa'i phur pa brgyad mkha' las bzad phu ri kham smyon zer bar babs pa de 'phral du ma shes kyang mi 'gyangs par grong pa bde chen gling stod pa'i pha longs spyod rgya mtsho'i bu byi lo pa gu ru zer ba lo bcu gnyis 'gro bas thog mar mthong ba gang yin snyam rdo brgyab pas sgra byung ba nang du bres a khu bkra shis rgya mtsho dang bcas phyin khro rnying gi bdun byung ba gcig rdo brgyab pas yin nam ji ltar rung ma tshang na'ang gzhan ma phur sgrub dang 'brel bar phur cha mkha' las 'di ga'i thad 'bab ma thub kyang bzad du babs pa dge legs kyi ltas su mngon no / /

rgya TaM /
yA ju bar khag rnams bstar grub nas gtam gyi mjug tu log bshad sogs su gyur srid pa dang /
ngag skyon la sogs pa rnams gter chen nyid kyi spyan sngar mi dge ba dang chabs cig bshags pa dang /
mkhyen ldan la bzod gsol byas ma thag gter chen gyis dbus tshogs pas drin rjes dran gyi legs sor 'khri shing dud pa bzhin gyi phyag mdzad /
bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'i rim pa gter chen nyid ma sgrigs lhun grub tu phebs pas gnang dgos tshul la gnang bya'i don smin gling rang gi dus dang 'dra bar phul ba rigs 'dzin chen pos kyang bsngo ba'i gsung bshad rgyang tsam ngos ljags bsngo rgyas par stsal zhing tshogs pa dang 'brug sprul la sogs der tshogs rnams kyi mthun 'gyur mdzad rjes 'dus tshogs rnams kyis ba shis brjod kyi dbyangs kyi nga ros stong gsum sbir zhing me tog gi char chen po phab /
phyi nyin rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor tshogs pa yongs rdzogs kyis gser sbrengs dang bcas spyan drangs klu chog bcas mer te gtsang por gshegs pa 'di skabs sngon ma'i grags la brten yul mi snod sogs khyer mi mangs pa'i sngon ma gnyis las longs spyod khyer bde ba byung song gzhan ma 'dra ba sogs mchod sdong 'byongs pa sogs lo khongs 'di nyid du gsang sngags gsar rnying gi rab tu gnas pa'i tha ma bkra shis chos sde pa mtshan sgra mchog tu dge bas mtha' brten bar ma bsgrigs lhun grub kyi rten cing 'brel ba mtha' dag rang bzhin du grub pa ste mdor na sngon zan g.yang mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i rab gnas kyi dus /
slob dpon chen pos /
phyi nang gsang gsum gyi rten 'brel zab mo bcu gsum 'dzom dgos pas /
phyi'i rten 'brel rje mnga' bdag chen pos sgrigs shig /
nang gi rten 'brel slob dpon dang cho ga mkhan por bltos pas mkhan po bo d+hi sa twas bsgrig pa dang /
gsang ba'i rten 'brel ye shes mngon gyur gyi rnal 'byor slob dpon chen po rang nyid kyis bsgrig par bka' bgros te tshul bzhin mdzad pas /
nyin dang po dang snga dro dang por rlung dang rdzi med cing nam mkha' dag pa dang /
nyi ma dro ba byung ba ni rgyal po bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i rten 'brel dang /
nyin dgung dang zhag bar nam mkha' 'ja' sprin dang 'ja' tshon dkar pos 'khrigs pa mkhan pos cho ga rnam par dag pa'i rten 'brel dang /
gung yol dang zhag gsum par nam mkha' 'ja' tshon lnga'i gur na dang sgra 'od sogs ltas sna tshogs byung ba slob dpon padmas ye shes mngon sum du phebs pa'i ltas su bshad pa ltar gong du so so'i dus brjod pa bzhin cha mtshungs sam snyam pa dang bcas rgyud las /
gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na / /

ces pa ltar legs par grub pa dang /

thang yig las /

'dus tshogs su mgron dang bcas pa'i babs bstun ba gyi bshad pa'i ngos rnam par dag pa'i ring lugs rnams kun slong gi zhen pa spangs te 'gal med du sgrub pa'i phyogs dang bcas gang spobs su phul pa gtso bo chos sbyin gyi sa bcad dang /

za ma tog bkod pa /
rgyal po bka' 'bum sogs du ma nas ri kha ba can gyi yul rnams 'dul zhing du gyur pa'i mes dpon gyis dbus pa'i rgyal po sngags pa rab byung sogs sku'i rnam 'gyur du mar bstan cing /

ces dang /
sher phyin stong phrag brgyad pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa mngon rtogs rgyan gyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u nyer gcig pa las kyang stobs bzhi'i skor rgya cher bshad nas /

sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur / /

zhes gsungs pa'i rgyu med tshul ni /
